```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```
```{r}

my_data <- read_excel("/Users/apple/Downloads/BA Dataset.xlsx")


```
```{r} 
head(my_data)
```

```{r}

graph<- ggplot(my_data, aes(x = 'territory.group', y = 'yearly.Income', fill = 'territory.group')) +
  geom_violin(trim =FALSE, fill='#A4A4A4')+
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of Yearly Income by Territory Group",
    x = "Territory Group",
    y = "Yearly Income"
  )+ scale_fill_brewer()+ 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

```
```{r}
print(graph)
```
